mapper.select: select date_format(o.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') createdAt, sum(op.quantity) orderAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) totalPrice, ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) refundAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) - ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) totalSales from tbl_order o left join tbl_order_product op on o.order_code = op.order_code left join tbl_order_canceled oc on op.order_code = oc.order_code group by date_format(o.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') order by createdAt

select date_format(o.created_at, '%Y-%m') monthly, sum(op.quantity) orderAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) totalPrice, ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) refundAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) - ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) totalSales from tbl_order o left join tbl_order_product op on o.order_code = op.order_code left join tbl_order_canceled oc on op.order_code = oc.order_code group by date_format(o.created_at, '%Y-%m') order by monthly

select concat(date_format(o.created_at, '%Y'), '-',quarter(o.created_at), '분기') dateQuarter, sum(op.quantity) orderAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) totalPrice, ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) refundAmount, sum(op.quantity * op.price) - ifnull(sum(oc.refund_amount), 0) totalSales from tbl_order o left join tbl_order_product op using (order_code) left join tbl_order_canceled oc using (order_code) group by dateQuarter order by dateQuarter;

SELECT p.product_name productName, format(SUM(CASE WHEN c.age >= 20 AND c.age < 25 THEN o.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0) AS teenager, format(SUM(CASE WHEN c.age >= 25 AND c.age < 30 THEN o.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0) AS twenties, format(SUM(CASE WHEN c.age >= 30 AND c.age < 35 THEN o.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0) AS thirties, format(SUM(CASE WHEN c.age >= 35 AND c.age < 40 THEN o.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0) AS forties, format(SUM(CASE WHEN c.age >= 40 AND c.age < 45 THEN o.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0) AS fifties, SUM(o.total_price) AS totalSales FROM tbl_order o left join tbl_customer c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id right join tbl_order_product op ON o.order_code = op.order_code left join tbl_product p ON op.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY p.product_name
